entry.title: Millbrook - Organic Light Spelt Flour Stone Ground - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: MillBrook
Type: FOOD
Price: 42.99

Details

Add a versatile and healthy ancient grain to your pantry with this Millbrook spelt flour! Spelt is a primitive relative of modern wheat and is one of the oldest cultivated grains; some evidence suggests that humans have been growing and eating it for as long as 8000 years. Though modern wheat has been more widely cultivated than spelt for centuries, spelt is gaining popularity as a healthy alternative to traditional wheat flours! Because it is related to wheat, spelt flour contains gluten, but the gluten proteins in spelt are more water soluble than those in wheat, making it easier to digest. This means that spelt flour should not be eaten by people with celiac disease or severe gluten sensitivities, though some people with wheat allergies and mild gluten sensitivities report that spelt is more easy to digest than flour. Its unique genetic structure also makes spelt flour a great source of protein and essential minerals including manganese, zinc, and copper! 
Because of its similarity to wheat, spelt flour can be used in practically any recipe that calls for all-purpose or wheat flour. Spelt adds a uniquely nutty flavor and a light texture to your baked goods! Spelt can generally be substituted for 50% of the wheat flour in a recipe, though if you have not used it before, you may want to start out by substituting 25% spelt flour and working your way up as you become more familiar with it. It's especially good for use in breads, pancakes, and cookies! No matter how you choose to use it, this ancient grain will add delicious flavor and wholesome nutrition to baked goods in your restaurant, bakery or cafe. This 10 Kg bag will keep you well-stocked for all of your culinary needs!

Spelt is a primitive relative of modern wheat and is one of the oldest cultivated grains; some evidence suggests that humans have been growing and eating it for as long as 8000 years. Because it is related to wheat, spelt flour contains gluten, but the gluten proteins in spelt are more water soluble than those in wheat, making it easier to digest. Because of its similarity to wheat, spelt flour can be used in practically any recipe that calls for all-purpose or whole wheat flour. Spelt adds a uniquely nutty flavor and a light texture to your baked goods! Spelt can generally be substituted for 50% of the wheat flour in a recipe, though if you have not used it before, you may want to start out by substituting 25% spelt flour and working your way up as you become more familiar with it. It's especially good for use in breads, pancakes, and cookies! No matter how you choose to use it, this ancient grain will add delicious flavor and wholesome nutrition to baked goods in your restaurant, bakery or cafe. This 10 Kg bag will keep you well-stocked for all of your culinary needs!

entry.title: Oliveio - Organic Hemp Seed Oil Cold Press - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oliveio
Type: FOOD
Price: 43.99

Oliveio - Organic Hemp Seed Oil Cold Press - 1 L

  • PREMIUM QUALITY – When It Comes To Supplements And Superfoods, You Want To Ensure You’re Ingesting The Best Of The Best - Organic, Premium, GMO-Free, Preservative & Additive Free. Our Hemp Oil is proudly produced in Canada from Canadian grown hemp seeds through an all-natural cold press extraction process using zero chemicals or heat.
  • A TRUE SUPERFOOD – Cold Pressed Hemp Oil is considered a superfood because it’s such a rich source of essential fatty acids, delivering 10g of Omegas in every serving (1 tablespoon). To ensure you conserve the essential fatty acids & reap all the nutritional benefits, we suggest you use it raw or in low to medium temperature cooking.
  • USAGE IDEAS – Hemp Oil is a pure, light oil with a slightly nutty flavour and a brilliant green colour. Whisk our raw Hemp Seed Oil into raw cider vinegar to make a delicious vinaigrette. Blend it with fresh basil for pesto. Add to any salad dressings, sauces, dips, and shakes for a quick and easy nutritional boost.
  • ALTERNATIVE DIET COMPATIBILITY – For vegans, vegetarians, raw, whole food, paleo, keto, & gluten free diets, unrefined raw hemp oil has an ideal balance of Omega-3 and Omega-6 fats and is a great alternative to fish oil.
  • DOES NOT CONTAIN CBD – CBD oil is cannabis oil which has significant content of cannabidiol. It is made from the flowers, leaves & stalks of hemp, NOT from its seeds like our 100% Pure Cold Pressed Hemp Oil is.

entry.title: Steep By Bigelow - Organic Green Tea With Pomegranate Tea Bags - 20/Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bigelow
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 5.49

Steep - Green With Pomegranate Tea - Pack Of 20

Enjoy the revitalizing effects of green tea with a fruity twist when you serve this Steep by Bigelow organic green tea with pomegranate! This flavorful green tea blend includes organic hibiscus, rose hips, pomegranate peel, and other natural flavors. When brewed, it has a light color and fruity, floral aroma. This green tea comes from the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant and undergoes a special handling process, leaving the green tea blend more delicate and lower in caffeine than black tea. Additionally, green tea is full of antioxidants that are a great part of any healthy lifestyle. Steep by Bigelow organic teas, such as this green tea with pomegranate, are grown using only natural fertilizers that are free of synthetic pesticides and additives.

An organic alternative to standard tea bags, this tea is packed with naturally-delicious flavor in each cup that you steep. Plus, it is made with simple, quality ingredients that are gluten free and non-GMO. Committed to maintaining freshness and flavor, each tea bag is wrapped and sealed in a stay-fresh foil packet to protect the tea from air and moisture. Mix and match flavors and serve these convenient tea bags as-is at the table. This good-for-you, organic tea blend is perfect for your restaurant, coffee shop, office, or cafe!

Steeping Instructions:
Bring fresh cold water to a boil. Pour water over tea bag, and steep for about 4 minutes. Remove tea bag. For iced tea, steep a little longer and pour over ice.

Silk Soy - Organic Milk Unsweetened Original Dairy-Free - 1.89 L

• Made from whole organic soybeans
• Absolutely no added sugar

• Excellent source of calcium
• 100% cholesterol-free
• Low saturated fat
• Free of dairy, lactose, gluten, casein, egg and carrageenan
• Verified by the Non-GMO Project’s product verification program

Serve your guests the wholesome flavor of this milk with their meals. 
This grade A milk is ultra-pasteurized to extend its shelf-life, making it perfect for supplying in your cafe, hotel breakfast bar, or bakery. Serve the milk plain with your patron's breakfast, pour over cereal, or use to create specialty lattes and teas.

It's also great for using in smoothies along with fresh cut fruit and organic yogurt to make an energy-boosting, on-the-go drink. From bakeries to fine dining establishments, milk and milk products are used to enhance almost any dish or dessert. The staple of any fridge or freezer, dairy products are essential for baking, cooking, and complementing your freshly prepared dishes. Our wide variety of milk, includes homo whole milk, skim, partly skimmed, Lactose free milk, Soy Milk substitute, Chocolate, Strawberry, Caramel milkshakes are important ingredients to stock at your breakfast, diner, restaurant, or bakery.

entry.title: Bob's Red Mill - Organic Cornmeal Medium - 680 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bob's Red Mill
Type: FOOD
Price: 5.49

Bob's Red Mill - Organic Cornmeal Medium - 680 g

Used for a variety of comfort food favorites, this yellow cornmeal is a versatile ingredient for any kitchen!

This cornmeal is hearty and starchy, and is great for giving your baked goods an extra tasty crunch and adding texture to savory dishes. To produce the best product possible, the yellow corn that goes into this cornmeal is picked by local farmers and then milled using techniques with superior attention to sanitation and food safety. When baking with cornmeal, it is important to note which grind size your recipe calls for, as each grind serves different culinary purposes.

Rightly Ground

This coarse ground cornmeal is perfect for making cornbread, corn muffins, hush puppies, as well as for breading. Great for breakfast and brunch menus, use to make grits or polenta; try adding minced garlic and grated Parmigiano Reggiano to your polenta for a savory foundation to your succulent meats!

Gluten-Free

Cornmeal is naturally free from gluten, making it a great option for making gluten-free, vegetarian, and vegan cooking.

Saves Prep Time

This bag of coarse ground cornmeal offers easier handling and a smaller footprint compared to bulk bags of flour. Ready to use, this corn flour is an essential ingredient to keep on hand and with its ample supply, this product is sure to meet the needs of your high volume kitchen or bakery.

Vendor: Heinz
Type: FOOD
Price: 15.99

Heinz - Tomato Ketchup Organic Family Size - 1.5 L

Made from fresh-ripened tomatoes and a special blend of spices, onion powder, and vinegar, this Heinz fancy grade tomato ketchup adds the perfect sweet and slightly tangy flavor to your menu items. Its vibrant red color and sweet, smooth consistency, and juicy taste make it a classic option to dip and enjoy with mild fried foods or to spread on top of sandwiches. From crispy, golden-brown French fries to hearty, old-fashioned burgers, your guests will fall head over heels for this savory condiment.

Heinz ketchup is created from premium tomatoes, grown from a special seed that produces rich tomatoes packed full of nutrients. Heinz ketchup includes essential vitamins, minerals, and lycopene, a healthy antioxidant found in cooked tomatoes.

Buy In Bulk to create perfect portions, or to refill bottles for table service. The is also easy to store as it's designed to easily close for safe storing, eliminating the need to waste time moving product into a different container for storage. Keep this ketchup on hand to make baked beans, marinades, and chili sauce or simply serve it plain to give your customers the condiment they grew up with and still love.

Made from high quality ingredients, you can find their beloved items almost anywhere as they're a great accent to delicious food dishes. Heinz condiments are sure to become a beloved staple in your establishment!

entry.title: Billy Bee - Organic Pure Natural Honey Upside Down Squeeze - 375 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Billy Bee
Type: BAKING
Price: 8.99

Add a touch of sweetness to your bakery, restaurant, or cafe with this Organic Pure Natural Honey Upside Down Squeeze, Liquid Amber honey..!

Looking for honey that's purely sweet and delicious without the additives and preservatives? This all natural honey is perfect for your bakery or restaurant! Whether your establishment specializes in farm-to-table fare or homemade-style baked goods, this honey brings bold flavors and nutrients from the honeybees to the table. Buying in bulk also saves you money and ensures your establishment is always fully supplied with this flavorful sweetener.

Versatile Ingredient

This all natural honey is a delicious way to get creative in the kitchen! Its fragrant flavor and velvety texture makes it the perfect complement to a variety of savory dishes, from classic honey-baked ham and sweet breads to sticky honey-glazed chicken! Use it to sweeten homemade granola or decadent yogurt parfaits. You can even try dissolving a spoonful to a steaming hot cup of tea. No matter how you choose to use it, your patrons are sure to love its sweet taste and subtle tang!

Classic Golden Color

This pure honey is collected from sweet honeycomb and is free from unwanted additives. It is naturally gluten-free with a classic golden color and a sweet, light taste.

Great Alternative to Sugar

This all natural honey is great for stirring into batters and kneading into dough for delectable cakes and lightly sweetened breads. Because it is so sweet, less honey is required to sweeten baked goods than sugar, making it a cost-effective option.

entry.title: Millbrook - Organic Quinoa Flour - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: MillBrook
Type: FOOD
Price: 126.99

 

Millbrook  - Quinoa Flour - 10 Kgk

Quinoa flour works well as a nutritious addition to all-purpose flour in many recipes, or as a substitute for wheat flour in your baked creations.

Try substituting this quinoa flour for half of the all-purpose or whole wheat flour that recipes call for to add healthy benefits and complex flavor to your baked goods! You can also use quinoa flour on its own or mix it with other gluten-free flours to create treats for your patrons with gluten sensitivities or celiac disease.

When used alone, quinoa flour has a very distinct taste and slightly gritty texture, so it's best used with bold flavors like cinnamon, cardamom, cumin, and coriander. This quinoa flour is perfect for creating delicious, gluten-free banana bread, pancakes, muffins, or scones! No matter how you choose to use it, this quinoa flour is sure to become a favorite ingredient in your kitchen

RISE Kombucha - Organic Lychee and Jasmine - 414 ml
